thread.title: Jenny Jinky
thread.title_full: Life Ionizers reviewed by Jenny Jinky

author: Jenny Jinky
title: Jenny Jinky
text: I would drink any other water except my alkaline water from life ionizer. I felt the difference in my health. I never more this healthy stronger and feeling prettier since I started this product. Customer service is great specially my rep Will Allen. He is very knowledgeable about the product and answered all my questions in a way I understand. Whenever I need them just phone call away or though email they response in timely manner. I highly recommend life ionizer for your alkaline water.
